page.title: 17RECREATION KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: Kirkby & Grewelthorpe have play areas and provide play equipment for younger children.{Cricket, football, quoits pitches at Kirkby Malzeard. By 1986 {tennis courts & bowling green}will be provided. Situated at gateway to the Dales{walking & cycling}are popular. Public houses provide{darts, dominoes, &{pool.}Facilities at Mechanics' Institute Kirkby for{badminton, {snooker, billiards. Dominoes}monthly (winter){T.V. viewing}and{reading}for stay at home types, Mobile library visits both villages (Fridays). {Gardening}popular. Kirkby Malzeard pantomime society produces an annual play in Spring and{pantomime}in Autumn. Children at both schools play {cricket, football, netball and {rounders.
